title: "While We Watched" Documentary Spotlights
selftext:
In this spotlight, Ravish Kumar and Vinay Shukla talks on [democracynow.org](https://democracynow.org)'s  YouTube channel about what is in this documentary. 

Do you guys think this will release in India and if does, what should be the good time for it to come out? 

Watch the discussion: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZRuxFnkVm8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZRuxFnkVm8)
comments: Mark Kermode reviewed it and gave it a thumbs up. Though I don't know that documentaries have any market in India for a theatrical release. It will probably get released on OTT though.
Ravish is the type of human being you cant ignore even though view points are different
it should get released in theatres even if on a small scale in posh areas
